title: Garden Australia (Captioned)
brief_description: Hosted by Graham and Sandra Ross this video is a collection of helpful and practical hints for the home gardener, taken from their popular weekly TV series. The video is divided into four segments: The vegetable garden, The flower garden, Australian natives and a miscellaneous section which includes hanging baskets, terrariums, lawns and fruit fly control.
